vaniso2d.c File Reference

vaniso2d -- 2D anisotropic diffusion. More...

Detailed Description

vaniso2d -- 2D anisotropic diffusion.

Description
Image denoising using 2D anisotropic diffusion.
Reference:
G.Gerig, O. Kuebler, R. Kikinis, F.Jolesz: Nonlinear anisotropic filtering of MRI data. IEEE Trans on Medical Imaging, Vol.11, No.2, June 1992.
Usage
vaniso2d
Parameters:
-in  input image
-out  output image
-iter  number of iterations
-type  type of diffusion function (0 or 1)
-kappa  diffusion parameter. Default: 4
-alpha  diffusion parameter. Default: 0.3
Examples
Known bugs
none.
Author:
G.Lohmann, MPI-CBS, 2004
